title: Experience
intro: Currently I have 7 years of commercial experience. During these years I did some freelancing, worked in small startups and large companies. I created my first programme long before I finished school - at the age of 13. Since then I programmed every day, which is now more than half of my life.

company.title: Open Reply UK, part of Reply Ltd
